All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ConsolePlayer
Class responsible for playing music (songs and music collections) through the console.
ConsoleRadio
Class responsible for handling the playback of radio stations through the console.
Genre
Enum representing the various genres of music.
HibernateUtil
Utility class for managing the Hibernate SessionFactory.
Main
Entry point for the Spotify application.
MainMenu
The main menu of the Spotify console application.
MusicCollection
Entity class representing a music collection.
MusicCollectionDAO
Data Access Object (DAO) for performing CRUD operations on MusicCollection entities.
MusicCollectionMenu
The menu for managing music collections in the Spotify console application.
MusicCollectionNotFoundException
Exception thrown when a MusicCollection is not found in the database.
MusicCollectionOperations
Provides operations for managing MusicCollection entities, such as adding, updating, deleting, and retrieving music collections.
MusicCollectionService
Service class for managing MusicCollection entities.
NameIsBusyException
Exception thrown when an entity's name is already in use or taken.
Operation
Interface for operations that can be performed on entities in the system.
Performer
Entity class representing a performer.
PerformerDAO
Data Access Object (DAO) for performing CRUD operations on Performer entities.
PerformerMenu
The menu for managing performers in the Spotify console application.
PerformerNotFoundException
Exception thrown when a Performer is not found.
PerformerOperations
Provides operations for managing Performer entities, such as adding, updating, deleting, and retrieving performers.
PerformerService
Service class for managing Performer entities.
PlayerMenu
The menu for managing the player in the Spotify console application.
PlayerOperations
Provides operations for playing radio stations, songs, and music collections.
Radio
Entity class representing a radio station.
RadioDAO
Data Access Object (DAO) for performing CRUD operations on Radio entities.
RadioMenu
The menu for managing radio stations in the Spotify console application.
RadioNotFoundException
Exception thrown when a Radio is not found.
RadioOperations
Provides operations for managing radio stations.
RadioService
Service class for managing Radio entities.
Repository<T>
Generic repository interface for CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations.
Service<T>
A generic interface for performing CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations.
Song
Entity class representing a song.
SongDAO
Data Access Object (DAO) for performing CRUD operations on Song entities.
SongMenu
The menu for managing songs in the Spotify console application.
SongNotFoundException
Exception thrown when a Song is not found.
SongOperations
Provides operations for managing songs in the system.
SongService
Service class for managing Song entities.
TypeOfMusicCollection
Enum representing the different types of music collections.
TypeOfSong
Enum representing the different types of songs.
